title: Candy Corn Rifle
summaries: The Candy Corn Rifle is a Hardmode post-Plantera gun that auto-fires Candy Corn as ammunition. Candy Corn is always dropped alongside the weapon in an amount ranging from 50 to 100. Additional Candy Corn can be purchased from the Arms Dealer for 5 CC if the Candy Corn Rifle is in the player's inventory.

Candy Corn shots pierce up to two enemies and ricochet up to four times, dissipating on their fifth impact or upon hitting a third enemy. The gun has a high fire rate, but unlike most guns, its projectiles are affected by gravity and do not remain airborne for long, though their ricocheting ability helps them gain distance. The Candy Corn Rifle has a base 10% critical strike chance as opposed to the usual 4%. Furthermore, it has a 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance to not consume ammo. The Candy Corn Rifle is dropped by the Pumpking during the Pumpkin Moon event with a 1.56 ~ 12.5% (6.25 ~ 12.5%) chance depending on the current wave.
